mapper.sql: id as id , msg_id as msgId , msg_name as msgName , msg_title as msgTitle , msg_type as msgType , content_model as contentModel , uniquekey as uniquekey
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO power_wx_msg ( msg_id, msg_name, msg_title, msg_type, content_model, uniquekey ) VALUES ( #{msgId}, #{msgName}, #{msgTitle}, #{msgType}, #{contentModel}, #{uniquekey} )

INSERT INTO power_wx_msg ( msg_id, msg_name, msg_title, msg_type, content_model, uniquekey ) VALUES ( #{map.msgId}, #{map.msgName}, #{map.msgTitle}, #{map.msgType}, #{map.contentModel}, #{map.uniquekey} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE power_wx_msg
msg_id = #{msgId},
msg_name = #{msgName},
msg_title = #{msgTitle},
msg_type = #{msgType},
content_model = #{contentModel},
uniquekey = #{uniquekey},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE power_wx_msg
msg_id = #{map.msgId},
msg_name = #{map.msgName},
msg_title = #{map.msgTitle},
msg_type = #{map.msgType},
content_model = #{map.contentModel},
uniquekey = #{map.uniquekey},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE power_wx_msg
msg_id = #{update.msgId},
msg_name = #{update.msgName},
msg_title = #{update.msgTitle},
msg_type = #{update.msgType},
content_model = #{update.contentModel},
uniquekey = #{update.uniquekey},
${nativeSql}

, uniquekey
FROM power_wx_msg
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1
